RedfishError.description: Contains an error payload from a Redfish Service.
RedfishError.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain an error payload from a Redfish Service.

error.description: Contains properties used to describe an error from a Redfish Service.
error.longDescription: This property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain properties used to describe an error from a Redfish Service.

RedfishErrorContents.description: Contains properties used to describe an error from a Redfish Service.
RedfishErrorContents.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain properties used to describe an error from a Redfish Service.

code.description: A string indicating a specific MessageId from the message registry.
code.longDescription: This property shall be a string indicating a specific MessageId from the message registry.

message.description: A human-readable error message corresponding to the message in the message registry.
message.longDescription: This property shall be a human-readable error message corresponding to the message in the message registry.

@Message.ExtendedInfo.description: An array of message objects describing one or more error message(s).
@Message.ExtendedInfo.longDescription: This property shall be an array of message objects describing one or more error message(s).

title: redfish-error.v1_0_0
